snippet: Mr. McMillon, 47, who started at the company at age 17, made an appearance at Walmart’s shareholders’ meeting on Friday.
abstract: Doug McMillon, new chief executive of Walmart Stores, stresses importance of technology, data and information as part of long-term strategy to improve customer service; also highlights need to move ahead in rapidly changing retail world and to keep up with online competitors that can offer comparable bargains and promise rapid delivery.
lead_paragraph: Mr. McMillon, 47, who started at the company at age 17, made an appearance at Walmart’s shareholders’ meeting on Friday.

headline.main: Walmart’s New C.E.O. Stresses Technology to Improve Customer Service
headline.print_headline: Walmart’s New C.E.O. Stresses Technology to Improve Customer Service
